Posts.Content: Hi everyone. I'm waiting for results of a biopsy. I have an appointment booked for this Thursday. Because this appointment was booked prior to me needing the biopsy (long drawn out story - you can find it in the under 50's group), I would have probably got the results Mon/Tues this week. My question really, is if it was bad news, would they have called me in earlier than Thursday, or are they inclined to just leave it as it is .. ? I have a suspicious mass sort of behind my right nipple. Can't decide if I love or hate Google, you can imagine what I've been finding out there.
Posts.Title: Average time for results?

Posts.Content: Thank you for your replies ladies, it's just so horrible waiting xx
Posts.Title: Average time for results?

Posts.Content: 3:45pm today, it will all become clear. I'm a bag of nerves. Sick with worry :(
Posts.Title: Average time for results?

Posts.Content: I got the all-clear this afternoon, I'm so so relieved! Many thanks to you all for your support, I wish you all well, this is a fantastic group of ladies xxx
Posts.Title: Average time for results?
